sense.def:
Up
pomeni proti višjemu prostoru ali na višjem prostoru.

seg.quote: I carried my suitcase up the stairs behind her.
Bill put up his hand.
...comfortable houses up in the hills.

sense.def:
To stand up
pomeni vstati.

seg.quote: She scrambled up from the floor.
She helped Henry up from the bench.

sense.def:
Up
pomeni tudi na severu ali proti severu.

seg.quote: We're having brilliant sunshine up here.

sense.def:
To go up a road
pomeni iti po cesti navzgor.

seg.quote: We walked up the road together.
There's a cafe just a hundred yards further up.

sense.def:
To go up a river
pomeni iti po reki proti njenemu izviru.

seg.quote: ...a voyage up the Nile.

sense.def:
Beseda
up
pomeni tudi, da je nekaj blizu nečesa drugega ali da se tistemu približuje.

seg.quote: It's only when you get right up to them that you realise what they are.
Ferdinand ran up to his father-in-law.

sense.def:
To be up
pomeni, da smo pokonci oziroma da nismo v postelji.

seg.quote: They were up early.

sense.def:
Kadar znesek
goes up
, se poveča.

seg.quote: ...when interest rates go up.

sense.def:
Obdobje je
up
, kadar se izteče.

seg.quote: When the six weeks were up, everybody was sad that she had to leave.

sense.def:
To be up for election, review, or examination
pomeni, da bo oseba ali stvar v kratkem na vrsti za izvolitev, pregled ali oceno.

seg.quote: One of my colleagues comes up for election next week.

sense.def:
To move up and down
pomeni premikati se izmenično v eno in drugo smer.

seg.quote: I was so happy I jumped up and down.
He started pacing up and down the office.

sense.def:
To have ups and downs
pomeni doživljati mešanico dobrih in slabih stvari.

seg.quote: What's up, Myra? You look sad.

sense.def:
Kdor je
up against something
, je v težavnem položaju ali pred težavo, s katero se mora spoprijeti.

Izraz
up to
uporabljamo v opisih, kako veliko je lahko nekaj.

seg.quote: They might be up to a metre wide.

sense.def:
Izraz
up to
uporabljamo tudi za opis, kakšno stopnjo je nekaj doseglo.

seg.quote: The work isn't up to the standard I require.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is up to someone
, je dolžnost določene osebe, da tisto naredi.

seg.quote: It is up to the teacher not to accept shoddy work.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
up to
ali
up until a particular time
, se zgodi pred tistim časom.

seg.quote: Up until the early sixties there was no shortage.
